Field Documentation

BOOL bTimeout

Indicates that an IO operation timed out.

TASK_STATE eState

Current task state.

BYTE* pacName

Pointer to the name of the task (ASCII).

TASK_FUNC pfTaskFunc

Pointer to the entry function.

struct Task_Struct* pstNext

Pointer to the next task (handled by scheduler).

struct Task_Struct* pstNextList

List pointer provided for Mutex and Semaphore.

WORD* pwStack

Stack pointer, defined by the task.

WORD* pwTopStack

Pointer to current stack top.

This is the basic task control block in the RTOS. It contains parameters and state information required for a task, including stack, priority, timeouts, entry funcitons, and task pending semaphore.

UCHAR ucMutexPriority

Priority inheritence used by mutex.

UCHAR ucPriority

Task priority.

USHORT usQuantum

Time to execute task before switching.

USHORT usStackMargin

Runtime stack margin.

USHORT usStackSize

Size of the stack in MAU.

USHORT usTimeLeft

Ticks remaining in blocked/sleep state.
